messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please watch out for clowns. They're horrendous.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Abigail. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Abigail. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
